results.advice: Since your banana plant is in the flowering stage with healthy green leaves, it s important to focus on its specific needs during this time. Make sure the plant gets 10-12 hours of direct sunlight daily and that the temperature stays between 26-28 C (79-82 F). Water the plant with 35-40mm of water per week (140-160mm monthly) and ensure humidity stays around 80-85 . Also, remember that banana plants need a lot of potassium and phosphorus during the flowering stage.
results.translated_advice: Aangesien u piesangplant in die blomstadium met gesonde groen blare is, is dit belangrik om gedurende hierdie tyd op die spesifieke behoeftes daarvan te fokus.Maak seker dat die plant daagliks 10-12 uur direkte sonlig kry en dat die temperatuur tussen 26-28 C (79-82 F) bly.Maak die plant met 35-40 mm water per week (140-160 mm maandeliks) water en verseker dat die humiditeit ongeveer 80-85 bly.Onthou ook dat piesangplante baie kalium en fosfor benodig tydens die blomstadium.
